body.name: QIAOLET Mini Projector,DLP Portable Projector,HD 150 ANSI Lumens Projector with Wifi and Bluetooth,Movie Projector & Home Theater for Iphone,Android,TV Stick/Laptop/PS5
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 17 hrs 16 mins
features: 🎁【DLP Projection Technology & Stereo Speaker】:Compare to market LCD projector,This QIAOLET DLP mini projector utilizes newst optically processed chip,offering more excellent clarity and contrast,lower power consumption, NO risk of black spots and yellow screen,With 150 ANSI of brightness, native 1080P supported,ensuring you get a clear and vivid high-definition picture whether indoors or outdoors, an impressive audio-visual experienceenjoy.

🎁【Pocket Size Design, Large Compacity Built-in Battery】:The compact design of this portable projector makes it highly portable（Size:3.1*3.1*1.1 inch,Only 0.4lb）. 5000Mah built-in battery make you can enjoy outdoor movie nights with family and friends anytime, anywhere. It's also an excellent choice for indoor home theater(Support Power Bank to Be Connected),.Meanwhile,this projector supports 3D projection, taking your visual experience to the next level.

🎁【Smart Keystone Correction & Versatile Connection】:This wireless projector supports Auto Vertical ±45° Keystone Correction,quickly obtain a perfect picture.versatile ports allow you to connect with a variety of devices such as iPhone, Android, TV sticks, laptops, PS5, Speakers and more.and we have pre-installed Netflix,Disney+,Prime Video,Youtube and other apps on the projectors for you, you can watch directly on the small projector.

🎁【No Latency 2.4G+5G WiFi & Two-way Bluetooth】:This projector with wifi and bluetooth comes with built-in 2.4G+5G/WiFi and Bluetooth, the transmission is faster and more stable, Whether you want to play games, watch movies,decorate cookies,conduct business presentations, or enjoy sports matches, this movie projector caters to a wide range of needs.

🎁【Worry-free Purchase, Quality Assurance】:When you purchase the QIAOLET bluetooth projector, we offer 24/7 service, 2-year free replacement and lifetime support.if you meet any problem during use,please feel free to contact us

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Your Entertainment, Anywhere: QIAOLET Projector Excellence big screen entertainment, pocket-sized convenience – meet the mini projector

Why Choose the QIAOLET Projector with Wifi and Bluetooth? Previous page Next page Compared to traditional LCD projectors,DLP projectors offer unparalleled image quality, more vibrant colors, extended lamp life, reduced maintenance costs, support for 3D projection, ultra-low input latency, portability, and enhanced energy efficiency. This translates to a superior visual experience
Previous page Next page 1 Home Theater 2 Camping Trip 3 Business Travel 4 Indoor Yoga

How long does the built-in rechargeable battery last on a single charge? This projector when fully charged, has a battery life of approximately 1.5 to 2 hours. Additionally, the projector supports charging while in use. What are the physical dimensions of the mini projector, and is it easy to carry around as a portable device? This mini projector's dimensions are only 3.1*3.1*1.1 inch, making it easy to fit in your pants pocket and very convenient to carry around. Does this projector with wifi and bluetooth support wireless connections to both iPhone and Android devices? This projector with wifi and bluetooth supports iPhone, Android devices, and also Bluetooth speakers and cameras. Additionally, there is no specific app required for connection. Is there a remote control included with the portable projector, and can it be operated remotely? This portable projector includes a remote control and also supports touchscreen operation Can this small projector support the use of YouTube and Disney+? Yes,we have pre-installed Netflix,Disney+,Prime Video,Youtube and other apps on the short throw projector for you, you can watch directly on the projector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy & satisfied customer here.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We were on the hunt of finding a mini projector that we can easily move from one room to the other and or to fam & friend’s place to regularly enjoy a great movie night.We highly recommended this Projector.(1) This Projector have Native 1080P Resolution, it’s a wow, it provides the highest picture quality. Other projectors only supporting 1080P, means it can only play 1080P video, but the actual output picture quality is only 480P or 720P, which is sneaky change of concept and misleading the consumers. If you want full HD projector, you need to choose Native 1080P, this projector is the best one we’ve tried so far.(2) There are probably two types of home projectors on the market. One is without a system. This kind of machine can only be mirrored on the same screen or inserted into other external storage. Since copyrighted content such as Netflix, Amazon Prime cannot be mirrored, this situation will severely limit the user's choice direction, if the projector is pre-installed with the Android system, you can directly download the application and install it on the machine, and then start using it directly, this is the benefit of the pre-installed system. In our case, we have movies, shows in our phones, tablets, external hard drive and we can easily use and play them directly.(3) There are many projectors with false standard brightness parameters on the market. The brightness of ordinary home projectors is roughly between 5000-7000 lumens, and the ANSI lumens is roughly between 200-300, for similar products of the same size, and it is the maximum value that the projector can achieve.(4) This machine has stereo surround sound option. It is very easy to distinguish the left and right channels, and the sound quality is very good. In our case, we love listening to movies loud to get the full theater experience, so we tried connecting to a soundbar, Bluetooth speaker and A/V receiver. And it is extra wow. We love it.(5) Like other similar projectors, this machine will have the problem of cooling fan noise, but overall, it’s very minimal and you won’t even notice or hear because you will be enjoying the video you are playing and forgot that there’s a fan noise on the side.Few minor items that we wish the projector had, are a lens cap & adjustable foot. They were not so much of a big deal because all in all, this machine is very compact. The product description they have are all very true.Overall, we love this projector. It is very user friendly. We have our old Panasonic PT projector hanging on the ceiling and it is jealous of this Qiaolet Projector because, this is our new favorite 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the perfect projector I've been looking for, highly recommended!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have been looking for a projector that can be carried on business trips, has high definition and can be connected to wifi, and finally I found it, this QIAOLET DLP mini projector!I finally found a projector that can be carried around, is compact, and can be turned on anytime. You only need to put it on the bedside, press the power button, and adjust the clarity by turning the black button next to the machine, and you will have excellent The picture quality is good, and it supports native 1080P resolution, has a 5000mAh large-capacity battery, and can also connect my mouse and keyboard using Bluetooth function, and can also be charged with a power bank, which makes me feel very informed!What’s special is that it has pre-installed built-in WiFi and Bluetooth, and apps such as Netflix and Youtube allow me to watch my favorite movies anytime and anywhere!I highly recommend this projector. It can be carried with you for ppt presentations or placed on the bedside to watch your favorite movies. It is also very convenient to carry on business trips. It has received 10 stars and is highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's basic, not very bright, but it does work
reviews.reviewText: This review is for the version of this projector you see in my review photos, which may differ from the ones in the product description.This is a good, basic LED projector that's compact, easy to use and does the job. The LED inside gets quite hot, so the projector has a fan to keep it cool. This makes the projector a bit loud due to the fan noise.You can connect your phone to the projector by connecting to its built-in WiFi access point. I tested this with my iPhone. Once connected, you can enable screen mirroring and the projector will show whatever is on your phone. This is pretty cool, as it doesn't require any other WiFi network. It can be used like this anywhere, even outside (as long as you have AC power).The projector supports flipping and flopping the image for ceiling mount and rear projection setups, which is expected. There's a 1/4-20 threaded hole on the bottom for mounting.The included remote is great, and makes focusing really easy. I hope I don't lose it!The main downside to this projector is the brightness. It's just not very bright. To get useful output, you'll need a highly reflective screen. A white wall isn't really going to cut it.Also, the product description says "true 1080p," but it's not. The LCD inside is 720p. The projector will accept a 1080p signal, but will not project at that resolution.Overall, it's decent, but don't expect to be able to project huge videos outside during your evening pool party.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Terrible display quality (very grainy), 1/2 second lag on display and horrible lag (approx 1 full second) with sound. Not very bright either. Room must be absolutely pitch black to see display, if any ambient light is present, forget about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The QIAOLET Mini Projector is very handy and easy to set up.
reviews.reviewText: The QIAOLET Mini Projector is very handy and easy to set up. However, it requires a dark environment to see it properly. The included remote control is very easy to use as well as the one on the top of the device. As far as picture quality and brightness, it's not as sharp as I would had liked, but considering the size of the device it's understandable. As far as the mini speaker goes, it's better to connect to an external speaker system or headphones via Bluetooth because the tiny speaker is not loud enough to have a good listening experience. Another feature is the EShare app, which is ok unless you have a Microsoft Laptop/ Tablet, since it won't cast wirelessly due to licensing regulations. Nevertheless, you can connect it via HDMI cable (included) and it's ok. If you have a Chrome device or an iOS device, it will cast flawlessly.Overall, I'm satisfied with the device and would recommend it to anyone.

reviews.reviewTitle: The system now works smoothly with netflix and youtube
reviews.reviewText: I recently got dm'd by the seller to upload a file through USB to my projector to upgrade the system version, now it runs smoothy with youtube and netflix and bunch of other apps, it is a great projector, with good speakers and a cool system, you can mirror your phone, your laptop and I haven't had any issues yet. The only reason I'm not giving it a 5 is due to it not having a better browser app experience.

Melhor custo benefício, boa qualidade de imagem, mesmo com luz acesa, áudio bom e alto, não aquece com muito tempo de uso, além do ajuste fácil quando o projetor é colocado inclinado. Veio bem embalado e a case também é ótima. Uso desde o dia que chegou e 0 defeitos.

The media could not be loaded. Ho avuto la necessità di un nuovo proiettore ed ho scelto la marca per l ottimo rapporto caratteristiche/prezzo. Come marca ho preso QIAOLET e sono rimasto piacevolmente sorpreso dalle sue prestazioni, e la grande attenzione al design, in quanto veramente un piccolo cubo dal design moderno ma che è eccezionale come qualita immagine.Il proiettore è dotato di una risoluzione nativa di 1080p, che offre un'eccellente qualità dell'immagine, dando il meglio di sé sul telo, infatti l ho provato sia sul muro dando una bellissima qualità dell immagine, mentre sul telo i colori diventano veramente brillanti e ancora più definiti.La luminosità è di ben 5500 lumen, che è più che sufficiente per proiettare immagini nitide e luminose in qualsiasi ambiente. Il proiettore è anche dotato di una gamma di ingressi, tra cui HDMI, VGA, USB e AV, che consentono di collegare facilmente una varietà di dispositivi.in più è possibile usare sia il wireless che bluetooth, addirittura con la funzione di screen mirroring di qualsiasi dispositivo.Inoltre, il proiettore è dotato di una funzione di correzione trapezoidale, che consente di regolare l'immagine in modo da adattarla alla superficie di proiezione. Questo è un grande vantaggio, poiché consente di ottenere un'immagine nitida e ben bilanciata, anche se la superficie di proiezione non è perfettamente piana.Inoltre, il proiettore è dotato di una funzione di riduzione del rumore, che consente di ridurre al minimo il rumore di fondo durante la proiezione. Questo è un grande vantaggio, poiché consente di godere di un'esperienza di visione più piacevole.In conclusione, il proiettore QIAOLET è un prodotto eccellente che offre un'eccellente qualità dell'immagine, una gamma di ingressi e una funzione di correzione trapezoidale. La funzione di riduzione del rumore è un grande vantaggio, poiché consente di godere di un'esperienza di visione più piacevole. Consiglio vivamente questo proiettore a chiunque stia cercando un prodotto di qualità ad un prezzo ragionevole, ma sopratutto che da spento sia anche un oggetto da tenere in mostra

reviews.reviewTitle: Mini projecteur hyper complet avec Android 9 intégré et support AIRPLAY
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Je ne suis pas du tout nouveau dans le monde de la vidéoprojection, ayant toujours eu du home cinema chez moi depuis plus de 25 ans.Mais c'est impressionnant ce que le marché a pu évoluer notamment en terme de format depuis.Quand je compare mon ancien JVC HD100 à ce produit ultra compact, la différence est frappante (je parle de la taille de l'appareil, pas ses performances)Bref, de nos jours, on cherche tous à optimiser l'espace, et l'achat de ce "petit" projecteur rentre dans ce cadre. Je voulais équiper une chambre supplémentaire disposant d'un grand mur blanc, mais sans avoir un énorme produit au plafond ou sur une table.... Donc mon choix s'est tourné vers un petit produit, que l'on peut poser sur une étagère, et qui ne nécessitera qu'une seul câble : le secteur. Car tout le reste est sans fil.... ou embarqué ! J'y reviens tout de suite.Donc déjà, côté package, vous retrouverez ici :- Le projecteur- L'adaptateur secteur- Un télécommande (⚠️ piles non fournies!)- Un câble HDMI- Un câble RCA/jack (wow cela fait longtemps que je n'en avais plus vu...)- Un petit guide d'utilisationVoici mon retour d'expérience après une semaine à "jouer" avec, et notamment ses avantages et inconvénients :✅ MATRICE FULL HD : 1080p natif, et supporte le signal UHD, mais en 2160p@30Hz max✅ FORMAT : super compact, il peut se faire super discret selon la configuration du lieu, mais posé sur une étagère entre des bouquins par exemple, vous ne le remarquerez même pas✅ KEYSTONE : L'appareil dispose d'une correction Trapézoïdale : verticale ± 45° automatiquement et horizontale ± 40° manuellement.✅ LAMPE : L'ampoule LED d'une durée de 30.000 heures... autant dire qu'elle n'aura jamais besoin d'être remplacée. D'ailleurs il n'est pas prévu de possibilité de le faire.✅ SON : Hauts-parleurs intégrés et STEREO : dans un si petit appareil, j'ai été agréablement surpris, le son est meilleur que celui de mon Samsung Frame 43", pour vous donner une idée. Bien plus de basse et de richesse de son. Evidemment ce n'est pas de la HiFi, mais vous pourrez sans soucis vous contenter du son intégré, d'autant que la puissance est très bonne, vous pouvez avoir un volume vraiment fort si vous le souhaitez. A mon grand étonnement je dois dire.✅ ZOOM MOTORISÉ avec une grande amplitude : La focale est assez courte, ce qui permet une très grande diagonale, même avec un recul limité.✅ WIFI et BLUETOOTH intégré ! C'est là qu'on voit l'évolution par rapport aux produits d'il y a quelques années seulement.✅ AIRPLAY et MIRACAST supportés : il suffit de lancer l'application dédiée et vous pouvez caster votre smartphone ou laptop sur le vidéoprojecteur. TOP.✅ SMART TV via le système Android intégré : Au fond le projecteur est totalement autonome et n'a besoin d'aucune source externe. Youtube et Netflix sont préinstallés, et vous pouvez ajouter Molotov, Amazon Prime Vidéo et toute application que vous le souhaitez depuis le Google Store puisqu'il embarque Android 9 !✅ Ports USB, HDMI, AV, et même TF card intégrés... la connective est en fait complète !✅ Port casque à l'arrière (je ne vois pas vraiment l'intérêt puisqu'il est blutooth donc vous préférerez un casque sans fil je pense✅ MONTAGE sur SUPPORT : sur la face inférieure de l'appareil, vous trouverez un filetage standard pour pouvoir monter le projecteur sur un support (qu'il soit mural, au plafond, au même trépied...).✅ PRIX : incroyablement bon marché pour un produit aussi versatile et complet finalement !Côté points négatifs, j'ai noté pour ma part :❌ YOUTUBE : pour je ne sais quelle raison, l'application Youtube intégrée limite la diffusion en 720p maximum. Pas de problème en revanche via une source externe.❌ NETFLIX : point de salut pour l'application Netflix intégrée faute d'accord... il faudra passer par une source externe (AppleTV, Firestick etc)❌ BRUIT de fonctionnement : le ventilateur du projecteur est assez bruyant. Dans une pièce totalement silencieuse, c'est relativement gênant pour une ambiance vraiment Home Cinéma. En revanche pour un usage Smart TV (Youtube, Molotov, etc..) c'est acceptable.❌ LUMINOSITE : Avec 200 lumens ANSI seulement, l'obscurité dans la pièce de projecteur est obligatoire (et là c'est correct), mais dans un séjour en journée cela ne sera pas suffisant.❌ Pas de LENS SHIFT ni horizontal, ni vertical, donc vous devrez placer votre projecteur à la bonne hauteur et bien centré pour avoir l'image au bon endroit sans perte de qualité. Vous pourrez toujours projeter "en biais", mais dans ce cas vous devrez recourir à la correction trapézoïdale, avec forcément une perte de qualité importante.❌ Petit détail, mais toutes les entrées/sorties et notamment le cordon d'alimentation sont à l'arrière du projecteur, donc si vous souhaitiez coller le vidéo projecteur contre un mur, ce n'est pas possible, le cordon gênera. J'aurais préféré toutes les prises soient sur le CÔTÉ du projecteur pour éviter le problèmeVoilà je pense avoir fait le tour. En conclusion c'est un produit vraiment bien conçu, qui vous permet une très grande diagonale de projection et peut remplacer votre SmartTV sans problème. Seule contrainte: la pièce doit être dans l'obscurité, et vous devez accepter un souffle de fonctionnement assez présent. Pour le reste, c'est un produit bon marché permettant l'affichage d'une grande image.

The media could not be loaded. In unserem Haus haben wir in diversen Räumen verschiedene TVs und Bildschirme stehen. Nun habe ich auch Bereiche, in denen ich gelegentlich auch einen Bildschirm bräuchte, es sich aber nicht lohnt, dort einen Fernseher aufzustellen. Dies ist zum Beispiel in unserer Großraumgarage der Fall. Daher habe ich mich nach einem erschwinglichen und leistungsstarken Beamer umgesehen. Dieses Modell von Qiaolet hat mich überzeugt, weshalb ich mich dafür entschieden habe.Der Beamer wird in einer eher quadratischen Verpackung geliefert. Dies liegt daran, dass der Beamer ein anderes Format hat als die standardmäßig bekannten Geräte. Dieses hat eher die Form eines Quaders, wohingegen die üblichen eher flach und breit sind. Das gekaufte Modell hat somit den Vorteil, dass es zwar nach oben hin mehr Platz benötigt, jedoch auf der Abstellfläche deutlich weniger in Anspruch nimmt.Design und Optik gefallen mir sehr bei diesem Gerät. Durch die weiße Farbe wirkt es schlicht, aber dennoch hochwertig. Die Qualität ist auch angemessen. Für diese Preisklasse ist die Verarbeitung und auch die Bauweise besser als erhofft.Die Anbindung an ein Endgerät funktioniert einfach, Hilfestellungen bekommt man auch in der detaillierten Anleitung. Die Menüführung ist aber einfach gestaltet, sodass man auch ohne Handbuch ans Ziel kommt. Der Beamer arbeitet mit dem Android OS 9.0, was stabil läuft und ein flüssiges Bedienen möglich macht. Zur Verbindung stehen in drahtloser Möglichkeit Bluetooth und auch WiFi zur Verfügung. So kann man in wenigen Sekunden eine Verbindung mit dem Smartphone, Tablet und Laptop herstellen. Zur Anbindung gibt es auch die Schnitstellen HDMI und USB, mit denen man sogar einen Fire TV Stick nutzen kann - finde ich richtig gut.Die Bildqualität ist besser als ich sie in diesem Preisniveau erwartet habe. Die Auflösung mit 1080P ist zwar "nur" Full HD, reicht für meine Anwendungsfälle wie Filme, Serien, Spiele oder Sportereignisse schauen vollkommen aus. Im Vergleich zu anderen Geräten sticht vor allem die Bildschärfe und auch die Helligkeit positiv heraus. Ich hoffe, dass dies auch auf Dauer so bleibt. Zur Fernbedienung kann man selbst das Handy koppeln und das Gerät bedienen - eben richtig smart.Die integrierten Lautsprecher sind ok, für ein Heimkino-Feeling sollte man aber externe Lautsprecher verwenden.Mein Fazit:Die ersten Filme habe ich bereits geschaut und bin begeistert von dem Gerät. Für den Privatgebrauch hätte ich nicht erwartet, dass ich bei diesem Preis doch so eine gute Leistung erhalte. Die Anbindungsmöglichkeiten sind vielfältig und die technischen Details lesen und zeigen sich gut. Demnach kann ich nichts gegen das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis sagen und in Summe volle fünf Sterne vergeben.
